definition: vary the frequency, amplitude, phase, or other characteristic of (electromagnetic waves)
details:
verb
- vary the frequency, amplitude, phase, or other characteristic of (electromagnetic waves)
- adjust the pitch, tone, or volume of
- fix or adjust the time, amount, degree, or rate of
= synonyms: regulate
- vary the pitch of one's speech
= synonyms: tone
- change the key of, in music
= example: change the key of, in music
